Published November 19 2014

Around we go again

Around we go again — Dropbox has updated their photo backup service, Carousel, with a new web interface and tablet apps. I tried Carousel for a while, but it tries too hard to be clever with photo sharing and gestures on iOS. The standard Dropbox app has the same features and is much more straightforward.

Enjoy your day.
